author: jgm
content:
My altona node synced.  Details as I see it:
  - current epoch 10,370
  - finalized epoch 7,240
  - time since finalization: just under 14 days

We are at 3,130 epochs in to our quadratic leak, and need to get to around 4,822 epochs before we kick validators (that would be the number if the validators started the leak period with exactly 32 Ether, which in general they didn't).  So we still have ~7.5 days before validators start to exit due to low funds.
